thread.title: Yamaha to Launch Naked Street-fighter MT-03 by The Next Year
thread.title_full: Yamaha to Launch Naked Street-fighter MT-03 by The Next Year

title: Yamaha to Launch Naked Street-fighter MT-03 by The Next Year
text:
Yamaha to Launch Naked Street-fighter MT-03 by The Next Year 21st, Oct 2015 3:47 PM View: 19 0 
After filing the patents for the MT-03 motorcycle in the India, the Japanese two wheeler, Yamaha, is making the way of MT-03 in the country next year via the CKD (Completely Knocked Route) route. The naked street-fighter would be the next motorcycle after the Yamaha YZF-R3 that has recently been launched in the country. Therefore, the couple of units have already been imported in the country for the testing purpose. The MT-03 is a naked version of Yamaha R25 and YZF-R3 that inherits the property of both faired models. The naked street-fighter could make its presence at the 2016 Auto Expo that will be held in Greater Noida. 
The naked street-fighter is powered by the same 321cc , liquid-cooled, fuel injected and parallel-twin motor delivering 41.6 PS of power at 10,750 RPM and 30 Nm of torque at 9000 RPM. The motor is coupled with a six-speed transmission. The naked motorcycle is 4 KG lighter than the YZF-R3 as the MT-03 weighs 165 KG. Moreover, the MT-03 is featured with compact tapered headlight, LED pilot lamps, massive fuel tank and spilt seat that give an aggressive appeal to the motorcycle. 
Read Also: What is Yamaha R25 Doing at Local Dealership? A Twirling Point 
The Yamaha MT-03 is built around on a diamond-type steel frame that sits on a rear swing arm and front telescopic suspension. The motorcycle is featured with front 110/70-17 tubeless tyre and a 140/70-17 tubeless tyre. The braking duties are taken care by a front two-piston caliper, 298mm disc brake and rear single-piston 220mm disc brake. The company has not blessed MT-03 with Anti-lock Braking System even as optional.
